title: Fail Better with Win/Loss Analysis
excerpt: If you're in sales, you'll fail sometimes. Failing is great if you learn from why you lost deals. Win/Loss Analysis can help you fail better.

title: Why Did I Lose the Sale? 6 Win-Loss Analysis Questions
excerpt: I’ve had the privilege of conducting “Win/Loss/No Decision Sales Cycle Analysis Studies” for leading companies including IBM, EMC, ATT, Acxiom, and PayPal. To accomplish these studies I have interviewed hundreds of C-level executives and countless mid-level managers and lower-level personnel....
